name: J’ba Fofi Spider
description: The J’ba Fofi Spider is a large, agile spider with impressive hunting skills, blending seamlessly into its forest habitat.
memorable: It can create camouflaged webs and summon swarms of spiderlings to aid it in battle.
goals: To ambush prey and control its hunting ground with webs.
relations: May collaborate with other spiders due to its Spider Passivism ability.
strengths: High strength and dexterity make it dangerous in melee and adept at avoiding attacks.
weaknesses: Low charisma limits its effectiveness in social situations.
attacks: Its primary attack is a venomous bite that deals piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Camouflaged Webs that can ensnare unsuspecting intruders.
senses: Has blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing it to detect creatures in close proximity even without light.
skills: Expert at stealth with a +5 bonus, making it difficult to detect.
additional_information: Offers significant control over battlefield space with webs.
Can climb any surface, including ceilings.
Releases pheromones to summon spider allies.
Relying on ambush tactics to capture prey.
Resilient with a high armor class.
test_queries: large lethal spider that ambushes in forests
stealthy spider that creates camouflaged webs
venomous spider that controls battlefield space
forest predator with deadly bite attack
